ref.mixed-citation:
Barba-Spaeth G
Dejnirattisai W
Rouvinski A
Structural basis of potent Zika-dengue virus antibody cross-neutralization. Nature 2016; 536: 48– 53. 27338953

note.p: This study demonstrates that antibodies against Zika virus can also neutralize dengue virus, which provides the rationale for the design of a universal vaccine capable of eliciting cross-neutralizing antibodies to protect simultaneously against both ZIKV and dengue virus infections.
